## RSpec Sidekick Reminder

![Ruby](https://images-wixmp-ed30a86b8c4ca887773594c2.wixmp.com/f/1fdc8935-ba5c-4fda-a4a2-f2338b7612ec/df12cv2-a596d7cf-8665-4c2f-bc55-d25481296dbd.png/v1/fill/w_1280,h_831,q_80,strp/steven_universe_ruby_by_unusualpotato1872_df12cv2-fullview.jpg?token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..a5XPEd71qVS9XfhSgeaZ0AeYHOh8rF_rImn0oI_VkDc)

This is a sidekick to help you navigate testing with RSpec. It contains use cases of commonly used methods.

This was created as notes from [this](https://www.udemy.com/course/testing-ruby-with-rspec/?couponCode=LETSLEARNNOWPP) RSpec course on Udemy.
